description.en: Retrieve detailed information about a specific Linear issue including description, state, assignee, and comments.
description.de: Ruft detaillierte Informationen über ein bestimmtes Linear-Issue ab, einschließlich Beschreibung, Status, Zugewiesenem und Kommentaren.

vars.API_KEY: env:LINEAR_API_KEY|Get your API key from Linear Settings > API at https://linear.app/settings/api

description.en: The ID of the issue to retrieve. You can find issue IDs using 'List Issues'.

inputs.name: Query
inputs.default: query Issue($issueId: String!) { issue(id: $issueId) { id identifier title description state { id name } assignee { id name email } priority createdAt updatedAt url labels { nodes { id name } } } }
